import React from 'react' export const EmptyCartScreen = () => { return (

  • Shopping Cart

    Price
    • {cartItems.length === 0 ? (
    Cart is empty
    ) : ( cartItems.map((item) => (
  • {item.name}
    Qty:
    ${item.price}
    • )) )}

Subtotal ( {cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty, 0)} items) : ${" "} {cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.price * c.qty, 0)}

); } export default EmptyCartScreen;
